name: Rigor Mortis
overview: Rigor Mortis is a computer game based on the comic book character by the same name featured in muCHOCOmi fanzine, published by Asociación Cultural Seis Viñetas / Salón Internacional del Cómic de Huelva, Citizens of the Year Award in Arts and Culture 2014. You are Death and you must take the patiens' souls to the Afterlife before they get healed and survive. Crazy doctors and hysterical nuns, among others, will try to prevent you from reaching your goal. If you've ever dreamed about impersonating the Grim Reaper... this is your game!
